graph TB
    subgraph Remote["GitHub (Remote)"]

    subgraph Local["Local Machine"]
        LOCAL["Local Git Repository<br/>(.git folder)"]
        HISTORY["Complete Version History<br/>All Branches"]

        FOLDER["Working Directory<br/>Files & Folders"]
